name: Balancing Cats
storyline: You’re an adorable kitty left in charge while your human is away. But instead of causing mischief, you’re on a mission to keep the kitchen spotless! Pesky mice are tossing food everywhere, and it’s up to you to catch every piece and balance them on your tray. How long can you keep the chaos under control? Challenge and put your skills to the test!
summary:
Tilt your phone to help a clever cat balance food while catching falling treats in a physics-based kitchen!

Challenge other players to reach the TOP!
